word_mean: 粘〔滞〕度，粘〔滞〕性：液体的一种物理性质，决定于对切力(shear forces)的内阻力
流体在流动状态下抵抗剪切变形的能力。
又称“黏性系数(coefficient of viscosity)”。

sentence.Network_en: Volatiles should not be added to the epoxies to improve their viscosity.
sentence.Network_cn: 不应将挥发物加到环氧树脂中去改善它们的粘性.

sentence.Network_en: The viscosity shows a rather pronounced variation with temperature.
sentence.Network_cn: 温度对粘度的影响十分明显.

sentence.Network_en: Viscosity overwhelms the smallest eddies and converts their energy into heat.
sentence.Network_cn: 粘性制服了最小的旋涡而将其能量转换为热.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French viscosite or medieval Latin viscositas, from late Latin viscosus (see viscous)

entry.def: Viscosity is the quality that some liquids have of being thick and sticky.

means.word_mean: 1. resistance of a liquid to sheer forces (and hence to flow)
